name: Download Arbitrary Files Via MSPUB.EXE
description: Detects usage of "MSPUB" (Microsoft Publisher) to download arbitrary files
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\MSPUB.exe OR process.pe.original_file_name:MSPUB.exe) AND process.command_line:(*http\:\/\/* OR *https\:\/\/* OR *ftp\:\/\/*))`
